name: Nintendo DS: Limited VIP Pak (included games)
description:
This package was available exclusively through Nintendo of Europe's Stars catalogue, allowing select players to own a Nintendo DS system before the official European launch date. Only 7,000 copies were sold in total; each country or region in which the bundle was offered had a certain portion of those units allotted to it. It contains the following:
  • Nintendo DS
  • Super Mario 64 DS
  • Metroid Prime Hunters: First Hunt
  • Demo version of WarioWare: Touched!
  • Nintendo DS t-shirt
